imdb.title: Oushitsu Kyoushi Heine
imdb.plot: Heine Wittgenstein is hired as the Royal Tutor for four princes in the kingdom of Granzreich. They hate tutors, and he must find a way to teach them.

episodes.title: The Royal Tutor Arrives
episodes.plot: Heine Wittgenstein, a man often mistaken for a small child, has been summoned to the royal palace of Glanzreich by the king to act as the royal tutor to the four younger princes Kai, Bruno, Leonhard, and Licht into capable candidates to the throne. However, he finds his task difficult because of the complicated personalities of his charges, who had managed to cause every tutor they had to quit.

episodes.title: The Prince Interviews
episodes.plot: Royal tutor Heine has been tasked with grooming four princes into potential kings. He's interviewed Prince Leonhard, but three more princes await. With each prince's personality as unique as the last, interviewing them will prove to be difficult.

episodes.title: You Don't Need to Accept Me
episodes.plot: Heine has finished interviewing all four princes and is ready to begin his first lesson, but will his young charges all assemble for it? And how did they do on their tests?!

episodes.title: The Princes Go to Town
episodes.plot: Today's lesson: an incognito field trip into the royal capital! The sheltered princes are excited right out of the gate, but it looks like they might be scheming something behind their tiny teacher's back...

episodes.title: Assailed by the Greatest of Trials
episodes.plot: When King Viktor returns to the palace after a long time away, he summons Heine and the princes for an audience. With his claim to the throne on the line, can Leonhard get through the trial his father puts before him?

episodes.title: At Café Mitter Mayer
episodes.plot: When he was a sickly child, Licht was always waiting in his bed for a certain person to visit... While strolling about the city one day, Heine steps inside a charming café, and the waiter who greets him is Prince Licht's spitting image!

episodes.title: The Whereabouts of a Dream
episodes.plot: From a young age, Prince Bruno has poured his utmost efforts into his studies to catch up with the crown prince who everyone saw as a genius. So when little brother Leonhard shows signs of genius, too--however unbelievable that may be--he panics.

episodes.title: A Timid Heart
episodes.plot: Ever since the king pointed out Prince Kai's communication problems, the second prince has been confused about how to go about improving them. Professor Heine and the prince's brothers have some advice for him, but can Kai put it into practice?

episodes.title: The Price of the Past
episodes.plot: One year ago, Prince Kai was suspended from military school for violent misconduct. Now the incident is back to haunt him in the form of a tabloid article. Can Kai overcome his past by truly confronting it?

episodes.title: The Professor I Don't Know
episodes.plot: Little by little, the princes have been facing their flaws as Professor Heine grooms them for the throne. But when Count Rosenberg makes another appearance, they realize there's one thing they still know nothing about: the royal tutor himself!

episodes.title: The Pair's Promise
episodes.plot: Professor Heine sends the princes on an assignment to investigate rumors of a criminal in the palace, and the truth shocks them.

episodes.title: The Last Lesson
episodes.plot: Heine has resigned from the post of royal tutor and the search for his replacement is underway. Can the princes prove that they've matured under his tutelage?
